storyInfo: An incident throws a wrench into FEater's plans, though she decides to get back on her feet and start over. Little does she know that a far greater challenge awaits her.

attributes.content: A certain luxury apartment in Lungmen...
*Beep*—
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: You have—one—new message. Press play to listen.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: (Hits play)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Shêng-shêng, where have you been? I went everywhere, asked just about everyone. None of them said they saw you.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: I was cheated too, y'know? I didn't expect that prick Sing to just take the money and split. I had a lot riding on that movie too. It's making my heart ache.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Shêng-shêng, listen to your Uncle Loeng. You shouldn't have put all your money in that project, no matter how much you loved the script.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Look where that got us. The movie's a bust. Everything down the drain.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: *Sigh*, let's not talk about this anymore; I know this really bummed you out. Uncle Loeng has a few friends at the L.G.D. They'll do their best to work this case for us and get us our money back.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Don't let this get you down. Call me when you have time.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: (Hits the stop button)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What a headache...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Well, shucks. That's all my savings gone!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: It was the crafty old codger who brought me on board. Well, alright, now that shit's hit the fan, it's like it's not his fault anymore.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Arghhhh—I'm so pissed!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What do I do now?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Maybe I should just head on home and take over Dad's tanghulu stall... *Sigh*... Mom's not gonna be happy. All she ever wants is me promoting the family kung fu style.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Pulls hair) I'm in one heckuva pickle...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Opens the fridge)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Beer... all gone. Whiskey... only a little left. Vodka... Finished it all.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Urgh, nothing to drown my sorrows with... Looks like I'll have to go downstairs for more.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Closes fridge)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: *Clang*—
Oww! That hurt!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What's this...? Ugh... The can I tossed on the floor yesterday.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (It's been days since I left home. It's such a mess in here... Maybe I should clean up after I get back.)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Gah, whatever... Maybe another time...)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Hm, craft beer... get a twelve pack. Rum, huh? Been a while. Gotta take a bottle! Let's see what else... There's a nice looking vodka up there too...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I can't reach it... Maybe if I jumped? Hmph!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Oh, crap, it's falling!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Ta-dah! Piece of cake.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Th-That's amazing!
Uh, who are you?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Miss Shêng-shêng! It's you, Miss Shêng-shêng! It's really you!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: I-I'm a fan of yours! I've seen every movie you were in. I watched every film in the 'Heavenedge Gallantry' trilogy multiple times. I-It's an honor to... to meet...
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Uh... I'm not any Miss Shêng-shêng! You're mistaken. You got the wrong girl!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: No way! The way you grabbed the bottle just now was exactly the same as that pose you did in 'Million LMD!' I saw that seven times! Couldn't be anyone else.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: That so? Haha. That one takes me back... like five or six years now...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Miss Shêng-shêng?
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Aiyah... Anyway, you got the wrong girl. I'm checking out now!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Am I being a bother, Miss Shêng-shêng? Sorry. I-I didn't mean to.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: I'm really sorry!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Eh, you... I... That's not what I meant... I just... *Sigh*... You want an autograph or something?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: An autograph?! Really? Thank you very much! Let me find a piece of paper. Give me a minute.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Uh, you found anything yet?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (This guy flipped through all his pockets already...)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I got it. I have this... dollar bill...
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Uh, no... This...
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Miss Shêng-shêng, this bill, please. Please sign it for me.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Uhh—Fine, alright.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (This dollar bill's all wrinkled up!)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Thank you, thank you so much!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You like kung fu stuff, huh? Just movies? Read any novels?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Of course, Miss Shêng-shêng. I've read all of Mr. Wong's greatest works, Qisi's short stories, and every issue of 'Monthly Wuxia' at the time!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You like Miss Qisi, huh? Everyone around me says her stories are too wordy, that they're a chore to read.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: A chore to read? No way. Her writing's exquisite, and the stories are so moving they always bring tears to my eyes. All her works are masterpieces.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You're ex—actly right! None of those numbnuts know how to appreciate a masterpiece!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Miss Shêng-shêng, do you like Miss Qisi's books too?
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Of course! 'The Assenting Fist' is my absolute favorite! The copy I have back home is falling apart from how many times I've read it!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Although...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Did you know?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: That novelette was going to be turned into a movie, until the actor who was going to play Yün Shêng was arrested for tax evasion. Then the producer took the money and skipped town, and that was the end of it.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: *Sigh*... What a shame. Now we'll never see it!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You know what they say. Life is like a box of chocolates...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Hm... Now that's not right. Yün Shêng's an upstanding, heroic fella who would rather die an honorable death than deal with corrupt bigwigs. A noble character like him couldn't be played by an actor with no morals.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: It's a good thing they cancelled that project. Haha.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: You're right. That's right, haha. That's a good way to think of it, hahaha.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: You're damned right. That guy's got a nasty disposition, can't act to save his life, and he's an idiot! Definitely not the right man for the job. I was so pissed when I heard he got the part.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Yeah, dodged a bolt there.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Oh, it's getting late. I need to head back soon.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I-I gotta go too, Miss Shêng-shêng. See you again. Uh, no, not quite right. We probably won't see each other again. Thanks for the autograph.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Uh, wait!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Lady Zhang, the sands in Na-lan are ever roiling. It's a one-way trip. Will you ever make your way back here? Will we ever meet again?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Yün, one can only make one's way home if there is a home. We will meet if fate allows, but there is no telling what the world has in store for us. Take care.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Heh, you really love this book, don't ya?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: See you around!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: The next day...
Agh... My head hurts. Hangovers suck... I shouldn't have had so much to drink last night. Urgh... I'm dying.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Shêng-shêng, what's going on?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hey, Lihua. Do you have any hot milk today? Skim? Get me a cup, will you?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Sorry, Shêng-shêng, but I'm just about to close up and go home. Sorry that I can't help you.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: You're closing? What's going on? Things looked alright when I was here yesterday.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: *Sigh*... We got robbed last night, and the thief knocked over a couple shelves when he ran away. The whole store was a mess. I only just finished cleaning up.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Oh, what about the thief? Did you catch him?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Phew—He got caught alright. Bao caught him herself. She got hurt in the scuffle. Broke off a huge chunk of her horn.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Huh? Where's Bao now?!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Slow down, Shêng-shêng. She's okay. She's just at the hospital to get some ointment for her horn. She'll be back.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Right, she can hold her own in a fight. That's an unlucky thief who runs into her. Oh, right, has anyone been asking about me?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: We've had a couple sketchy-looking reporters asking where you've been. I sent them on their way after I fed them some BS, just like Bao told me too.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: (Scratches head) Sorry for all the trouble. I'll take you guys out for a meal one of these days!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: It's thanks to you that Bao and I can put down roots here in Lungmen. It's the least we can do.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hehe, lucky I get all my drinks here, right?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: That only goes so far... Oh, right, Shêng-shêng. Do you have all your things on you? Wallet, jewelry?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Got everything... I think. Why'd you ask?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: The thief talked to you for a while last night, so I was thinking... maybe he stole some of your stuff while you weren't paying attention.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hehe, there can't be anyone stupid enough to steal from—
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Hold on. Who did you say it was?!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Oh, it was that guy who struck up a conversation with you last night.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: What?! Him?!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What's the matter, Shêng-shêng?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Uhh... Where is he right now?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I-in an L.G.D. holding cell?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Sorry, gotta go—
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: —See ya next time!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Huh? Shêng-shêng!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Looks down) I...
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Alright, kid, the young lady here's paying your fine. You can go now. Don't you ever steal again. Do better.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Of course, ah sir. Never again.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You should thank the lady.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You dick, why'd you do something like that?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Stomach growls)
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Whatever, let's get you something to eat first.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Ah sir, thanks for the help!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: That voice... it sure was familiar. Where have I heard it before...?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: How stupid are you? That's Miss Wan. Didn't you just watch 'L.G.D. Tales' last night?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: What?! You mean that lady with the shades...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: That's right. She's your favorite movie star, Wan Shêng-shêng.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: How did I miss that?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Man, she's had it real tough lately, though. The movie she invested in didn't work out. She's probably going bankrupt.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: How did that happen?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Sheesh, do you ever watch the news? It's been the talk of the town. Apparently the guy she was working ran into money problems, so he split and left her the mess to deal with.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: Oh no. She must feel terrible.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Here's your big finballs. With radish and noodles. Enjoy.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Man, these are the best finballs I've ever had! I could eat these a thousand times, and I'd never get sick of them!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Haha, you're a big movie star, but you still come to our street stalls. You'd better watch out for the paparazzi. They're all laughing through their lenses.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Where's there to be afraid of? If they got a picture of me here, that's more business for you.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Forget it. I can't afford your endorsement fees. Eh, hey fella, not gonna eat?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Just dig in. What are you so shy about?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Thanks, Miss Shêng-shêng.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You guys keep talking. I'll check the curry soup I'm cooking in the back.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: So these are finballs. It's my first time trying them since I got to Lungmen. They're good!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: I here a lot. They say the guy who runs the stall used to be the boss of one of Lungmen's biggest gangs, and he started selling finballs after he retired from organized crime.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: *cough*—*cough* *cough* *cough*...!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: (Glances at them)
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Hehe, just kidding.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: *Cough*... *gulps*, I'm okay, Miss Shêng-shêng.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Right, you still haven't given me an answer.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Why'd you do something like that?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I... It'd been two days since I last had anything to eat. I was starving.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Alright. So you were hungry and you tried to swipe some food. Why did you hurt that lady?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: When the shop's owner caught me, she saw me holding a dollar bill. She wanted me to pay her with it and wouldn't let me go.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: You didn't want to pay up, so you hurt the shop's owner?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: It was the last dollar bill I had.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: But that doesn't mean you had to...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Oh... You mean that one.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Yeah, I was going to the store to buy something to eat, but I met you there, and you signed your name on it. I couldn't spend it.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Alright, I get it.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Do you... have anywhere to go?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: N-No... My landlord evicted me last week.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: What'll you do now? Go back home?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: My parents died early. I don't have anybody left back home.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Do you have any friends here?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I only just got to Lungmen two months ago. No time to make any friends.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Miss Shêng-shêng, I don't have any skills... It's not easy for me to make a living. I'm really glad I met you...
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: *Sigh*, don't think like that. Things will get better.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: (Wipes away tears) Sorry for all that trouble I caused.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: What's your plan... for now?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I don't know. If I can just somehow earn enough to put food on the table, things ought to work out somehow.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Boss, you got a pen?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Yeah, in the small drawer. Help yourself.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Let's see. There we go. Can I take a sheet of paper?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Go ahead!
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: (Scribbles something down)
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Miss Shêng-shêng?
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Well, this guy's a stage manager I know. Head over there, and have him give you some errands to run. He doesn't pay much, but he can get you meals and a place to sleep.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Thanks... a lot.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Boss, two more orders of finballs. One to go, and one for here.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: You got it.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Live a decent, upstanding life from here on out, okay? Keep your head down and walk on. Forget everything behind you.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Here's your finballs to go.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Take them with you. And those aren't my treat. You'll have to pay me back once you make it big.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Waaahhh... Miss Shêng-shêng... I'm so sorry.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Alright, now get to the studio. You won't find him there if they're done filming for the day.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Yeah, thanks. I'll head there now.
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: See ya!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I'll work hard, I'll be a good person!
attributes.name: Hapless Man

attributes.content: Yeah, I know you will!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What's with the sigh? My finballs don't taste good enough for you?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Things are tough for me too, you know.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What's the matter? Uncle Loeng stopped by yesterday. He said you haven't picked up his calls for a whole week.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Remember the book we talked about before?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Qisi's 'The Assenting Fist?'
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Yeah, lost all the money I put down on it.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: How much?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: All.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: No way. Not even a cent left?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I still have some savings, but it's in a trust for a charity. I can't touch that money.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What will you do, then?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: If luck's on my side, maybe we can catch the guy, and I'll get my money back.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What if...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I'd have to start over. Don't worry, I got moves. I'll find myself a movie to shoot. Don't worry about me going hungry.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What about your plans?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: What plans?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: You know, the less sober you are, the more likely you are to worry about the future. Either thinking what comes tomorrow in your sleep or mumbling what's next while you're drunk. Then, when you come to, you think to yourself, the less you gotta worry about, the better life is.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: You'll have another chance. The future'll get better.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: You don't need to console me. I'm a tough gal. As long as I get a taste of your finballs tomorrow, things will work out somehow!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: What's the thumbs up for?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Hah, I mean, you can't rely on luck to eke out a living.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I run into these small, happy happenings every once in a while. Those short moments might not change anything, but they help me get through the next couple of days.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: So you ran into any of those small, happy things lately?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: You betcha. I just had some of your finballs. They're super good.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Hmph, anything else?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Hmm... Let's see. Oh, right, a director came calling. The gig pays well too. I might go audition tomorrow.
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Alright, I'll treat you to a bowl of finballs.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: (Sets down a bowl of finballs on the table)
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Huh? What's this? A new recipe?
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I'm trying out a new spicy flavor. Don't know if there's a market for it, so I figured I'd have you taste test.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I approve!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Ahhhhh! My tongue's burning. That's hot, even for me!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: I got some ice water here.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Ahhh, no way! *Huff*! This is a good omen! Don't throw cold water on... *Huff*... I'm gonna rake in all the dough. My career's gonna be on fire!
attributes.name: Wan Shêng-shêng

attributes.content: Oh, you...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Two weeks later...
Hey, Jia, morning. Here, a coffee for you.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: Thanks, Yao. How's today been? Busy?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Got way too much to work, *sigh*... What are you flipping through the papers for?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: Looking for the entertainment news. Speaking of which, how come I haven't seen any news on Miss Shêng-shêng lately?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: What, haven't you heard? She got hurt shooting a movie the other day. Got taken to the ER. I wonder how she's doing.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: If it was just a flesh wound, she should've gotten out by now, right? I haven't read anything about that, though.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: She's a movie star. They keep a low profile when these things happen. She might have made it home already. Stop worrying about her.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: It still bothers me, though...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Come on, you're a big guy. Why so sensitive?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: Nah, it's just... When I left home this morning, they took down all the billboards and ads with her. Not a single one left.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Huh. Weird.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B
